comments:
Go to "Format Chart" tab, select "Y Series", click "Labels" button, system 
throws exception

Steps:
1.Drag a chart into the layout
2.Open the chart builder
3.Select Chart type to  3D Bar
4.Go to "Format Chart" tab
5.Select "Y Series"
6.Click "Labels" button

Expected Results:
1.Sytem pop up a labels properties dialog

Actula Results:
1.System throws exception
